## **Shiny Application about Movies**

-   This app aims to help users analyze and explore movie data interactively.

-   Users can gain insights into how the number of movies in different genres has varied over the years.

-   The visualization provides a quick and intuitive way to observe trends and make comparisons.

## **Link to Shinyapps.io**

[My Shiny App](https://gozdeugurkayar.shinyapps.io/Movies/)

## **Command Line**

```         
shiny::runGitHub(repo = "pjournal//mef07-GozdeUgurK",subdir="Shiny/app.R")
```
